segments.text: Wait, is that water really overflowing from the sink?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect to see such a flood in a tidy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing her plate so intently, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the water—how has she not noticed?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stool reaching for cookies catches me off guard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That jar is way up high; he's really going for it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, like she's in on the secret—surprising teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to give way; oh wow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's garden view is so serene compared to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never thought a simple dish drying would hide so much action.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of unexpected little dramas.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies spilling out would be a shock too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm amazed at how much is happening without anyone knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR
